#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int cases;scanf("%d",&cases);
    for(int t=0;t<cases;t++)
    {
        long m,n;scanf("%ld %ld",&m,&n);
        if(m==0||n==0) printf("0\n");
        else printf("%ld\n",(m-(m+1)/2 + n-(n+1)/2 + 1));
    }
    return 0;
}
